Rulings.Base:
1. If "Skill Drain" is activated after "Infernity Avenger" is Special Summoned by its own effect, its Level will return to its original Level.
2. You cannot activate the effect of "Infernity Avenger" when a Token Monster or "Embodiment of Apophis" is destroyed by battle.
3. If you control your opponent's monster and it is destroyed by battle and sent to your opponent's GY, you cannot activate the effect of your "Infernity Avenger".
4. The Level of "Infernity Avenger" is increased by the original Level of the destroyed monster.
5. If multiple copies of "Infernity Avenger" are in the GY, you can Special Summon all of them.
6. If you have 1 or more cards in your hand when the effect of "Infernity Avenger" resolves, it will not be Special Summoned.
